message: Member name not following naming convention - Name 'mPrimaryShapeColor' must match pattern '^(([a-z]{2})|([x-z][A-Z]))[a-zA-Z0-9]*$'.
Member name not following naming convention - Name 'mSecondaryShapeColor' must match pattern '^(([a-z]{2})|([x-z][A-Z]))[a-zA-Z0-9]*$'.
Local variable name not following naming convention - Name 'line_nr' must match pattern '^[a-z][a-zA-Z0-9]*$'.
